text: riot band mates released drones
for real estate and ever more packed
flights good afternoon this is the New
York Times minute to members of the punk
group Riot were released from a
Russian prison today they were jailed
after a 2012 protest against President
Putin but for them the move doesn't
signal a change just image management
ahead of the sochi olympics 43 here why
realtors are increasingly using drones
to film high-end properties all this in
spite of an FAA warning against using
drones outdoors for commercial purposes
clearly that warning has gone unheeded
so far and if you weren't already
dreading holiday travel a look at
airline legroom the space between seats
and coach has fallen from 34 inches two
decades ago to on some airlines just 28
today the reason when Southwest squeezed
one more row into their planes they
squeezed out an additional 200 million
dollars a year in revenue
